plot: This one-hour documentary explores the facts and fictions behind the presidency of Herbert Hoover including The Great Depression and its lasting impact on government.
title: Landslide: A Portrait of President Herbert Hoover

original_name: Landslide: A Portrait of President Herbert Hoover

cast.role: Himself - Author, 'The Life of Herbert Hoover'
